video_prompt: Woman walking through a dynamic, color-shifting, glass-paneled corridor. Reflective ground shimmers with undulating light. Glowing orbs emerge and vanish along the horizon. Colors transition from teal-blue to vibrant purple-pink across the environment.
image_prompt: Surreal landscape with a woman walking through an infinite corridor of receding, rectangular, gradient glass panels (teal-blue to purple-pink). Translucent panels create layered reflections and refractions, with glowing orbs along them. Reflective ground mirrors the scene. Woman in white jumpsuit, hair cascading, her reflection visible. Serene, futuristic, dreamlike, soft dawn/dusk lighting.
refined_video_prompt: A woman strides forward. The glass corridor's vibrant hues constantly shift around her. Undulating light actively shimmers across the reflective ground. Luminous orbs rhythmically emerge and vanish along the horizon. The entire environment's palette fluidly transitions from deep teal-blue to vibrant purple-pink.
